TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaDocumentation extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject

Docs.summary: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). This class specifies information to be read or used by humans within an .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Information supplied within the `XmlSchemaDocumentation` class is not used in validation. However, it provides a standardized way to supply information that can be retrieved by tools.
## Examples The following example creates the `documentation` element.
[!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaDocumentation Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_23_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlSchemaDocumentation Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_23_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaDocumentation Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_23_1.vb)]
The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example.
